Text:
Was hoping for an NTSC copy of this, but this will do for now.

Love your uploads man! can copy these right over to my portable wii drive and don't have to waste bandwith with full iso rips. Wish there were more of you other there.

Worked Great.
Another great Nintendo Wii game torrent...

This game stops on instruction about wiimote and the wiimote controller doesn't work.
Some body help me please! I ran this game with gx loader, uloader, wiiflow, and even cfg loader
But this game stops on instruction. I installed cios d2x ver7 (all recommended) and cios202/222/223/224 by Hermes. Please somebody help me.
